description: Notification of a new overload condition on a Passive
Monitoring interface.

event.Summary: Overload condition detected on passive monitoring interface

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonOverloadSet IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonLastOverload b 0 JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonCurrentOverload b 0 JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonLastOverloadDate x 07cc09010F1E00002b011E

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Identifies the last overload condition to change on this
interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonLastOverload

description: Identifies current overload conditions that exist on this
interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonCurrentOverload

description: The system date and time when the management subsystem last
learned of a change to the overload condition on this
interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonLastOverloadDate

description: Notification of a cleared overload condition on a Passive
Monitoring interface.

event.Summary: Overload condition cleared on passive monitoring interface

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonOverloadCleared IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonLastOverload b 0 JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonCurrentOverload b 0 JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonLastOverloadDate x 07cc09010F1E00002b011E

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Identifies the last overload condition to change on this
interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonLastOverload

description: Identifies current overload conditions that exist on this
interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonCurrentOverload

description: The system date and time when the management subsystem last
learned of a change to the overload condition on this
interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PMon-MIB::jnxPMonLastOverloadDate
